items.value: Michael got lost at the Center!

nice to see you again!
You seem like a nice Guy.
Would you like to be my friend and help me?
As soon as I have the situation under control here I will reward you!

Michael needs:
5x Rope
5 x Dutch Tape

Come back when you have the things!
i can help you, here is the Stuff you need!
i am sorry but i cant help you right now!

You are great!
That really helps me to build my hiding place.
I see you are friends with Sergio, please bring him these 6 special delivery boxes. He will reward you for that!

You get:
6x Special Delivery Box (for Sergio)
2x Metro ticket

Come back when you visited Sergio! Take Donuts with you ..
Thanks and see you soon Michael!

Sorry but I need these things!
I can't go on without these things.

Come back when you have the things i need ..
